Package it.unipi.di.p2p

Class Coordinator.AggregateResults

  • Object
    • AggregateResults
  • Enclosing class:
    Coordinator

    private class Coordinator.AggregateResults
extends Object
    A Class to hold aggregate statistics on the ran simulations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) double avgDist
      Average distance (number of identifiers) between consecutive nodes.
      (package private) double avgHops
      Average number of hops for a query.
      (package private) double avgQueriesPerNode
      Average number of queries that are performed by each node.
      (package private) Map<BigInteger,Integer> distances
      Stores the number of occurrences of a certain distance between any node and its predecessor.
      (package private) int endNodeCount
      Counts the distinct endnodes
      (package private) Map<String,Integer> endnodes
      Stores a list of nodes that are endnodes for some query (and the number of queries for which that particular node is endnode).
      (package private) Map<Integer,Integer> hopCounts
      Stores the number of occurrences of queries of a certain length.
      (package private) Map<Integer,Integer> nodesForEachQueryNumber
      Stores the number of nodes that perform a certain number of queries, i.e.
      (package private) Map<BigInteger,Integer> queriesReceivedByEachNode
      Stores the number of queries that each node performs.
      (package private) double stdDevDist
      Standard deviation for the distance between consecutive nodes.
      (package private) double stdDevHops
      Standard deviation of the number of hops for a query.

    • Field Detail

      • queriesReceivedByEachNode

        Map<BigInteger,Integer> queriesReceivedByEachNode
        Stores the number of queries that each node performs. (A node performs a query if its lookup method is called.)

      • nodesForEachQueryNumber

        Map<Integer,Integer> nodesForEachQueryNumber
        Stores the number of nodes that perform a certain number of queries, i.e. if there are x nodes that perform y queries (each), then the pair (y, x) is stored in this map.

      • distances

        Map<BigInteger,Integer> distances
        Stores the number of occurrences of a certain distance between any node and its predecessor.

      • hopCounts

        Map<Integer,Integer> hopCounts
        Stores the number of occurrences of queries of a certain length.

      • endnodes

        Map<String,Integer> endnodes
        Stores a list of nodes that are endnodes for some query (and the number of queries for which that particular node is endnode).

      • endNodeCount

        int endNodeCount
        Counts the distinct endnodes

      • stdDevDist

        double stdDevDist
        Standard deviation for the distance between consecutive nodes.

      • avgDist

        double avgDist
        Average distance (number of identifiers) between consecutive nodes.

      • stdDevHops

        double stdDevHops
        Standard deviation of the number of hops for a query.

      • avgHops

        double avgHops
        Average number of hops for a query.

      • avgQueriesPerNode

        double avgQueriesPerNode
        Average number of queries that are performed by each node.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AggregateResults

        private AggregateResults​()

    • Method Detail

      • addDistance

        void addDistance​(BigInteger dist)
        Adds the distance between two nodes and updates the average and standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        dist - The distance to add to the statistics.

      • addEndNodeCount

        void addEndNodeCount​(String s)
        Adds an endnode to the statistics.
        Parameters:
        s - The endnode to add to the statistics.

      • addSingleQuery

        void addSingleQuery​(BigInteger query)
        Adds a single query to the statistics, updating also the average queries per node.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to add to the statistics.

      • addMultipleQueries

        void addMultipleQueries​(ArrayList<BigInteger> qc)
        Add a sequence of queries to the statistics, updating also the average queries per node.
        Parameters:
        qc - And ArrayList of queries to add to the statistics.

      • addHopCounts

        void addHopCounts​(int hops)
        Adds the number of hops of a query to the statistics, updating the relevant average and standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        hops - Number of hops of the current query

      • toCSV

        String toCSV​()
        Outputs the current statistics in CSV format.
        Returns:
        A String containing the statistics collected insofar, in CSV format.

      • average

        private double average​(Map<Integer,Integer> m)
        Computes the average of a map where the keys are the elements and the values are their occurrences' count.
        Parameters:
        m - The Map that stores the data to average.
        Returns:
        The average of the given data.

      • stdDeviation

        private double stdDeviation​(Map<Integer,Integer> m,
                            double avg)
        Computes the standard deviation of a map where the keys are the elements and the values are their occurrences' count.
        Parameters:
        m - The Map that stores the data to find the standard deviation.
        avg - The average for the abovementioned map.
        Returns:
        The standard deviation of the given data.

      • update

        private <T> void update​(Map<T,Integer> m,
                        T key)
        Updates one statistics with the received data.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the data.
        Parameters:
        m - the Map containing the data for the statistics.
        key - The newly-received data.
